title: Bikes For U
description: A full stack web application, which can be used by three types of users (Buyers, Sellers, and Admins). Buyers can view orders and purchase products. Sellers can add and remove their products. Admin can view all sellers and all buyers.
technology: React, MongoDB, NodeJs, Stripe, Firebase, Tailwind.

title: Fitness Folk
description: This is a personal service (fitness-related) and service review website. Users can add, delete and update their own reviews. Users can also add services while logged in.
technology: React, react-photo-view, Tailwind, Firebase, MongoDB, NodeJs.

title: Skill Edge
description: It is an educational website, where users can choose the course of their choice. Users can log in through Google, or GitHub with Firebase authentication. Users can download PDFs to know details about all courses.
